author: Agencies
title: Reality show on Zayn?
text:
Agencies | October 06, 2015, 22.41 pm Zayn Malik Apparently, Zayn Malik is in talks with various networks — including E! — about starring in a new reality show about his life after quitting the most popular band in the world, according to HollywoodLife.com.
“Zayn is talking to E! and other networks about a reality show that will document his time after being in One Direction and working on his new music. It will counter when new music comes out, so it’s not going to be any time soon, but within the year. Don’t expect it to come out in 2015,” a source told HollywoodLife.com.
His highly-publicised split with former fiancee, Perrie Edwards, would likely be talked about in one form or another in the reality show. And his alleged relationship with Carlyn Bryan would likely be put under the spotlight, too.
